LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.AccuracyOvercapping.De: Ranged weapon accuracy can go over 100%, with diminishing returns.
LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.BiocodeBonus.Descripti:
Treat biocoded equipments as two quality higher when giving infusing.
For example, normal quality biocoded items will get infusions for excellent quality equipments.
LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.ExtractionChanceFactor: Multiplies success chance of infusion extraction. Possible values are 0.0 ~ 100.0. Default is 1.0.
LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.ReusableInfusers.Descr: Infusing an equipment with an infuser creates a new empty infuser.
LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.Mu.Description:
Specifies multiplier for mu value of normal distribution, to use when selecting infusions from pool. Possible values are 0.5 ~ 10.0. Default is 1.0.
Larger values result in more strictly limited infusions for the equipment's quality.
Note: Infusions must also pass probability test before infusing. Change probability factor to adjust overall number of infusions an equipment may get.
LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.Sigma.Description:
Specifies sigma value of normal distribution, to use when selecting infusions from pool. Possible values are 0.5 ~ 10.0. Default is 1.5.
Larger values allow more varied infusions, regardless of the equipment's quality.
Note: Infusions must also pass probability test before infusing. Change probability factor to adjust overall number of infusions an equipment may get.
LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.ChanceFactor.Descripti:
Multiplies probability of infusions. Possible values are 0.0 ~ 100.0. Default is 1.0.
With default infusions, 100 would ensure that every selected infusions will be applied to the equipment. 0 will effectively disable new infusions.
LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.BodyPartLimit: Limit infusions by body parts covered
LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.BodyPartLimit.Descript: Maximum infusion slot count will be limited to numbers of body part groups an apparel covers.
LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.LayerBonuses: More infusions for more layers occupied
LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.LayerBonuses.Descripti:
For each extra layer an apparel occupies, grant one infusion slot.
Applied after the body part limit, i.e. an apparel which protects arms and torso will have its slots limited to 2. But if it occupies 3 layers, the limit will become 4 instead.
